document_data.mainbody:
eordros was one of the three leaders of the Azatl settlement in Nexal in 1362 DR.
Jeordros ruled over the largest territory. In his territorys restricted areas, humans were instantly sent to the slave market.
Jeordros dreamed of one day challenging Hoxitl. He was fanatical about clearing out the ruins in the hopes of gaining control of the sacred square of Azatl.
